full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Contract Title: Temporary Help Services
### Solicitation Number: S5024665

**Tender Details**
* **Reference Number**: cb-343-9034901
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Publication Date**: July 17, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: August 1, 2024 13:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: July 25, 2024

**Contract Overview**
The Department of National Defense (DND) is seeking Temporary Help Services through a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the Supply Arrangement (SA) EN578-172870. The contract is open to suppliers qualified under the following streams and categories:
* Stream 5 – Computer Services
* Category 5.1 – Computer Application Support

**Eligible Suppliers**
The following SA holders have been invited to submit a proposal:
* Access Corporate Technologies Inc.
* ALTRUISTIC INFORMATICS CONSULTING INC.
* Cache Computer Consulting Corp.
* IPSS INC.
* MDOS CONSULTING INC.
* OLAV CONSULTING CORP. and MOSHWA ABORIGINAL INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY CORPORATION (in joint venture)
* Quantum Management Services Limited / Les services de gestion Quantum Limitée
* Talencity Inc.
* Tech4soft Inc.
* TECHNOLOGIES CYSCA INC. and CYSCA TECHNOLOGIES INC. (in joint venture)
* TechWind Inc.

**Tender Description**
Department of National Defense (DND) has issued a Request for Proposal for Temporary Help Services to suppliers generated from CPSS who are qualified under the streams and categories listed above. The RFP aims to provide temporary help services to meet the DND's requirement.

**Required Documents**
The complete tender package, including terms and conditions, can be downloaded from [attachment URL](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/42355/s5024665---method-1---rfp.pdf) and [attachment URL](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/42355/s5024665---method-1---right-fit---dp_0.pdf).

**Notice from the Contracting Entity**
Please note that this tender is cancelled and no further submissions will be accepted. The contracting entity is the Department of National Defense, located at 60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, ON K2H 8
